title: Game crashes, Disconnection issues, and Que Dodgers
body: I have been playing for about 2 months now, and have spent fairly decent sum of money involving myself in the game which i really enjoy; however, it is getting really irritating to constantly have to deal with crashes, and disconnection issues.  I have re-installed the game which seemed to help for about 2 days.  Every 2nd or 3rd game I get into I or someone else gets disconnected, and it is very hard to get reconnected in time.  I didn't have these issues on 6.15........ I also am getting very frustrated with que dodgers! why hasn't something been done about them.. maybe re work the que system so that your can't dodge if you don't like the make up.  Anyhow, I am getting to the point where i don't want to play anymore which is a shame because i managed to get to the point where I can look the other way on just about every hater in this game... Almost feels like my time is getting wasted now. :(

replies.body:
It sounds like you are having a combination of issues here, and I'd like to help.  If you are crashing after a repair, then there may be driver or hardware issues that are failing to render the game.  I suggest going over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to make sure that your PC is in shape to play.  

Regarding your connection issues, your network could be having problems connecting to the servers or at least maintaining comms.  Your best bet would be to review our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.

It's important that these issues are resolved, otherwise you could face more penalties.  You can try these in custom games to test without issues.  Let me know if you have any questions.
